subject: Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Javier Castellano is the jockey for three top Kentucky Derby prospects, Union Rags, Algorithms and El Padrino. He faced a tough choice on which one to ride on Sunday.
snippet: Javier Castellano is the jockey for three top Kentucky Derby prospects, Union Rags, Algorithms and El Padrino. He faced a tough choice on which one to ride on Sunday.
